titleStmt.title: A declaration of the Right Honourable Robert, Earle of Warwick, Lord High Admirall of England, and of all the plantations belonging to any his Majesties, the King of Englands subjects upon the coasts of America, Governour of the Company of London for the Plantation of the Summer Islands; and of the said Company: to the colony and plantation there.
titleStmt.author: Warwick, Robert Rich, Earl of, 1587-1658.
Company of London for the Plantation of the Summer Islands.

titleStmt.title: A declaration of the Right Honourable Robert, Earle of Warwick, Lord High Admirall of England, and of all the plantations belonging to any his Majesties, the King of Englands subjects upon the coasts of America, Governour of the Company of London for the Plantation of the Summer Islands; and of the said Company: to the colony and plantation there.
titleStmt.author: Warwick, Robert Rich, Earl of, 1587-1658.
Company of London for the Plantation of the Summer Islands.

notesStmt.note: Wing has 1644 for publication date; Thomason received his copy in 1645.
Includes two petitions from the inhabitants.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

orgName.name: Bermudas Company for the Plantation of the Somers Islands.
